Name: Reception at the home of the animals
Description: This ostracon, of which the drawing is badly effaced, belongs to the genre of "animal stories". What we see here is probably the reception of an important lady. One distinguishes a  mouse sitting on a large chair, served by foxes. The first presents a flagellum, the second, a drink, and the third plays the harp. One other fox, who is kept behind the mouse, is part of the staff of the house.
